name: @taskin/types-py
motivation: Provide automatically generated Python models from the TypeScript type definitions.
solve: Allows Python packages to consume the same type definitions without duplication.

scripts.generate: bash -c 'mkdir -p generated && for file in ../types-ts/dist/schema/*.json; do uv run python -m datamodel_code_generator --input "$file" --output "generated/$(basename "$file" .schema.json).py"; done'
scripts.publish:pypi:check: uv build && echo 'Build successful. Ready to publish to PyPI.'
